# 常見圖資運算


## CRS轉換

```{r}

#取出spData套件附的world圖資
data(world, package="spData")

class(world) #已是sf object

world %>% 
  st_crs() #查看圖資的CRS

```

```{r}

Lis1 <- list()

read_sf("sf-Taiwan/COUNTY_MOI_1080726.shp") ->
  Lis1$sf_Taiwan

```

```{r}

#將world之CRS套用至sf_taiwan

world %>% 
  st_crs() -> 
  crs_world

Lis1$sf_Taiwan %>% 
  st_transform(crs = crs_world) -> 
  Lis1$sf_Taiwan2



```

```{r}

#sf_Taiwan %>% st_set_crs(3826) %>% st_crs()

Lis1$sf_Taiwan %>% 
  st_crs()

Lis1$sf_Taiwan2 %>% 
  st_crs()

```

## 幾何簡化

```{r}

library(rmapshaper)

```

```{r}

Lis1$sf_Taiwan2 %>% 
  rmapshaper::ms_simplify() -> 
  Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_sim

```

```{r}

world %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(
    data = Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_sim
  ) + 
  theme_classic()

#若忘了轉換CRS，ggplot會自動採用最底層圖資的CRS

```

## 切出部份範圍

```{r}

world %>% 
  st_crop(
    xmin = 119, 
    xmax = 122, 
    ymin = 24.6, 
    ymax = 25.3
  ) -> 
  world_small

Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_sim %>% 
  st_crop(
    xmin = 119, 
    xmax = 122, 
    ymin = 24.6, 
    ymax = 25.3
  ) -> 
  Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_small

```

```{r}

world_small %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(
    data = Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_small
  ) + 
  theme_classic()

```

## 找中心點

```{r}

load(url("https://www.dropbox.com/s/elnvocol0nnkcc9/sf_northTaiwan.Rda?dl=1"))

```

```{r}

sf_northTaiwan %>%
  st_centroid(of_largest_polygon = T) ->
  sf_centroid_northTaiwan
# of_largest_polygon = T: 找最大polygon的中心點

sf_northTaiwan %>% 
  st_geometry()

sf_centroid_northTaiwan %>% 
  st_geometry()

```

## 使用 coord_sf(xlim=...,ylim=...) 限縮範圍

```{r}

world %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(
    data = Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_sim
  ) + 
  theme_classic()

world %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(
    data = Lis1$sf_Taiwan2_sim
  ) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  coord_sf(
    xlim = c(119, 122), 
    ylim = c(24.6, 25.3)
  )

```
